info.name: CareXpert Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for CareXpert healthcare platform including user management, doctor/patient portals, appointments, AI chat, and more.

request.description: Get a new access token using refresh token

formdata.value: Experienced cardiologist with a focus on preventive care

request.description: Create a new time slot for doctor availability
Generate multiple time slots in bulk
Get all time slots for logged-in doctor
Get all appointments for doctor with detailed info
Get medical history of a patient
Add or update prescription for an appointment
Get pending appointment requests from patients
Respond to appointment request (CONFIRMED or REJECTED)
Get city-based chat rooms for doctors
Create a new prescription template with name, description, prescription text, and tags
Get all prescription templates for logged-in doctor with optional filters by tag and active status
Get a specific prescription template by ID

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Updated Template Name",
  "description": "Updated description",
  "prescriptionText": "Updated prescription text",
  "tags": ["updated", "tags"],
  "isActive": false
}

request.description: Update an existing prescription template (all fields are optional)

query.description: If true, permanently delete; otherwise deactivate (soft delete)

request.description: Delete or deactivate a prescription template. Use permanent=true to delete permanently, otherwise it will be deactivated (isActive=false)
Use a prescription template to create a prescription for a patient. Can customize the text and link to an appointment. Sends email notification to patient.
Get all unique tags from doctor's prescription templates for filtering
Search for doctors by specialty and location
Get available time slots for a doctor
Get city-based chat rooms for patients
Get chat history with another user
Get Agora token for video call
Process symptoms and get AI analysis
Get AI chat history for user
Clear all AI chat history for user
Get all symptoms for authenticated user
Get all medical reports for patient
Get details of a specific report
Create a new weight measurement for a patient. The system will auto-calculate BMI if both weight and height are available.
Create a new height measurement. BMI will be auto-calculated if weight is also available.
Create heart rate measurement with custom timestamp
Get all health metrics for a patient with optional filters for metric type, date range, and abnormal values

item.name: Get Health Metrics - Filtered by Type

request.description: Get metrics filtered by multiple types (Weight, Height, BMI)
Get only abnormal health metric readings

query.description: Metric types to analyze (can specify multiple)

request.description: Get trend analysis for specific metrics including average, min, max, and percentage change over time period
Get the latest reading for each metric type for a patient
Get abnormal metrics requiring attention (only accessible by doctors and admins)
Get a specific health metric by its ID
Update a health metric. Only the user who created it or an admin can update it.
Delete a health metric. Only the user who created it or an admin can delete it.
